menu.title: Dancing Life
menu.myLifeAndArtDesc: Some of the important moments when my life has nourished my art and when my art as nourished my life.
menu.workshopDesc: In this workshop we discover differents methods for exporing how art and life meet.
menu.roadmapsDesc: For my artistic work and teaching, I have developed series of tools that generate creativity. Here are the ideas behind these practices relating to the body, the community and our planet.
menu.indexDesc: A list of keywords relating to my life and work that will help you identify particular topics you would like to explore.
